articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - The oil market is likely to be in balance in the second half of 2021, even though European coronavirus lockdowns and U.S. winter storms caused disruptions in March, crude and petro… [+2591 chars]
articles.description: The oil market is likely to be in balance in the second half of 2021, even though European coronavirus lockdowns and U.S. winter storms caused disruptions in March, crude and petroleum products market price structures showed.
articles.title: Oil price structures show market balance returns in second half of 2021 - Reuters
